text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
…Directions? Yeah, I remember. 
Course I know my way to a 
friend's place.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Turn right after leaving the station, 
and head on straight… Your place 
is near the big-ass park, right?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Fetch me from the station? 
C'mon! Don't treat me like an idiot, 
damn it! …Even if I'll get lost!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
…I mean, city streets are easy. 
Hey, why not you move into the city, 
like today?
